TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebHeaderCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class WebHeaderCollection Inherits NameValueCollection Implements ISerializable

summary.span: 包含与请求或响应关联的协议标头。

span.span: Contains protocol headers associated with a request or response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类通常通过访问或。The class is generally accessed through or . 一些常见标头被视为受限制的目录并且可直接通过 API (如`Content-Type`) 和受系统保护，也不能进行更改。Some common headers are considered restricted and are either exposed directly by the API (such as `Content-Type`) or protected by the system and cannot be changed. 受限制的标头是：The restricted headers are: - 接受Accept - 连接Connection - Content-LengthContent-Length - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 预期Expect - HostHost - If-Modified-SinceIf-Modified-Since - 范围Range - 引用站点Referer - Transfer-EncodingTransfer-Encoding - User-AgentUser-Agent - Proxy-ConnectionProxy-Connection

summary.span: 将指定的标头插入集合中。

span.span: Inserts the specified header into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `header`参数必须指定"名称： 值"格式。The `header` parameter must be specified in the format "name:value". 如果集合中不存在指定的标头，则会将新的标头添加到集合。If the specified header does not exist in the collection, a new header is added to the collection. 如果在指定的标头`header`已存在集合的值部分中，则`header`串联在一起的现有值。If the header specified in `header` is already present in the collection, the value part of the `header` is concatenated with the existing value. ## Examples 下面的示例将为名称/值对添加使用方法。The following example adds a name/value pair to a using the Method. [!code-cpp[WebHeaderCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Add/CPP/webheadercollection_add.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebHeaderCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Add/CS/webheadercollection_add.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebHeaderCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Add/VB/webheadercollection_add.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的标头。

span.span: Removes the specified header from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从集合中删除指定的标头。 deletes the specified header from the collection. 如果不存在指定的标头，该方法返回。If the specified header does not exist, the method returns. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法移除标头。The following example uses the method to remove a header from the . 删除标头后，此示例将打印到屏幕，用于证明它已被删除的所有现有标头。After the header is removed, this example prints all existing headers to the screen to prove that it has been removed. [!code-cpp[WebHeaderCollection_Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Remove/CPP/webheadercollection_remove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebHeaderCollection_Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Remove/CS/webheadercollection_remove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebHeaderCollection_Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Remove/VB/webheadercollection_remove.vb#1)]

span.span: The value to set.
The content of the header to set.

summary.span: 将指定的标头设置为指定的值。

span.span: Sets the specified header to the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果标头中指定的标头不存在，方法将新的标头插入到标头名称/值对的列表。If the header specified in the header does not exist, the method inserts a new header into the list of header name/value pairs. 如果在指定的标头`header`已存在，则`value`替换的现有值。If the header specified in `header` is already present, `value` replaces the existing value.
